name: discord-hono
description: Cloudflare Workers module for interacting with the Discord API
author: Luis (https://github.com/LuisFun)

scripts.patch: prettier . --write && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor: prettier . --write && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major: prettier . --write && npm version major && git push --follow-tags
scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && npm run esbuild:cjs && npm run esbuild:esm
